Name: Add-AppProvisionedPackage
Synopsis: Adds an app package (.appx) that will install for each new user to a Windows image.

Name: Add-ProvisionedAppPackage
Synopsis: Adds an app package (.appx) that will install for each new user to a Windows image.

Name: Add-ProvisionedAppxPackage
Synopsis: Adds an app package (.appx) that will install for each new user to a Windows image.

Name: Apply-WindowsUnattend
Synopsis: Applies an unattended answer file to a Windows image.

Name: Get-AppProvisionedPackage
Synopsis: Gets information about app packages (.appx) in an image that will be installed for each new user.

Name: Get-ProvisionedAppPackage
Synopsis: Gets information about app packages (.appx) in an image that will be installed for each new user.

Name: Get-ProvisionedAppxPackage
Synopsis: Gets information about app packages (.appx) in an image that will be installed for each new user.

Name: Optimize-AppProvisionedPackages
Synopsis:
Optimize-AppXProvisionedPackages -Path <string> [-WindowsDirectory <string>] [-SystemDrive <string>] [-LogPath <string>] [-ScratchDirectory <string>] [-LogLevel <LogLevel>] [<CommonParameters>]

Optimize-AppXProvisionedPackages -Online [-WindowsDirectory <string>] [-SystemDrive <string>] [-LogPath <string>] [-ScratchDirectory <string>] [-LogLevel <LogLevel>] [<CommonParameters>]

Name: Optimize-ProvisionedAppPackages
Synopsis:
Optimize-AppXProvisionedPackages -Path <string> [-WindowsDirectory <string>] [-SystemDrive <string>] [-LogPath <string>] [-ScratchDirectory <string>] [-LogLevel <LogLevel>] [<CommonParameters>]

Optimize-AppXProvisionedPackages -Online [-WindowsDirectory <string>] [-SystemDrive <string>] [-LogPath <string>] [-ScratchDirectory <string>] [-LogLevel <LogLevel>] [<CommonParameters>]

Name: Optimize-ProvisionedAppxPackages
Synopsis:
Optimize-AppXProvisionedPackages -Path <string> [-WindowsDirectory <string>] [-SystemDrive <string>] [-LogPath <string>] [-ScratchDirectory <string>] [-LogLevel <LogLevel>] [<CommonParameters>]

Optimize-AppXProvisionedPackages -Online [-WindowsDirectory <string>] [-SystemDrive <string>] [-LogPath <string>] [-ScratchDirectory <string>] [-LogLevel <LogLevel>] [<CommonParameters>]

Name: Remove-AppProvisionedPackage
Synopsis: Removes an app package (.appx) from a Windows image.

Name: Remove-ProvisionedAppPackage
Synopsis: Removes an app package (.appx) from a Windows image.

Name: Remove-ProvisionedAppxPackage
Synopsis: Removes an app package (.appx) from a Windows image.

Name: Set-AppPackageProvisionedDataFile
Synopsis: Adds custom data into the specified app (.appx) package that has been provisioned in a Windows image.

Name: Set-ProvisionedAppPackageDataFile
Synopsis: Adds custom data into the specified app (.appx) package that has been provisioned in a Windows image.

Name: Set-ProvisionedAppXDataFile
Synopsis: Adds custom data into the specified app (.appx) package that has been provisioned in a Windows image.

Name: Add-AppxProvisionedPackage
Synopsis: Adds an app package (.appx) that will install for each new user to a Windows image.

Name: Add-WindowsCapability
Synopsis: Installs a Windows capability package on the specified operating system image.

Name: Add-WindowsDriver
Synopsis: Adds a driver to an offline Windows image.

Name: Add-WindowsImage
Synopsis: Adds an additional image to an existing image (.wim) file.

Name: Add-WindowsPackage
Synopsis: Adds a single .cab or .msu file to a Windows image.

Name: Clear-WindowsCorruptMountPoint
Synopsis: Deletes all of the resources associated with a mounted image that has been corrupted.

Name: Disable-WindowsOptionalFeature
Synopsis: Disables a feature in a Windows image.

Name: Dismount-WindowsImage
Synopsis: Dismounts a Windows image from the directory it is mapped to.

Name: Enable-WindowsOptionalFeature
Synopsis: Enables a feature in a Windows image.

Name: Expand-WindowsCustomDataImage
Synopsis: Expands a custom data image.

Name: Expand-WindowsImage
Synopsis: Applies an image to a specified location.

Name: Export-WindowsCapabilitySource
Synopsis: Export-WindowsCapabilitySource -Source <string> -Target <string> -Path <string> [-Name <string>] [-Recipe <string>] [-WindowsDirectory <string>] [-SystemDrive <string>] [-LogPath <string>] [-ScratchDirectory <string>] [-LogLevel <LogLevel>] [<CommonParameters>]

Name: Export-WindowsDriver
Synopsis: Exports all third-party drivers from a Windows image to a destination folder.

Name: Export-WindowsImage
Synopsis: Exports a copy of the specified image to another image file.

Name: Get-AppxProvisionedPackage
Synopsis: Gets information about app packages (.appx) in an image that will be installed for each new user.

Name: Get-NonRemovableAppsPolicy
Synopsis:
Get-NonRemovableAppsPolicy -Path <string> [-WindowsDirectory <string>] [-SystemDrive <string>] [-LogPath <string>] [-ScratchDirectory <string>] [-LogLevel <LogLevel>] [<CommonParameters>]

Get-NonRemovableAppsPolicy -Online [-WindowsDirectory <string>] [-SystemDrive <string>] [-LogPath <string>] [-ScratchDirectory <string>] [-LogLevel <LogLevel>] [<CommonParameters>]

Name: Get-WIMBootEntry
Synopsis: Displays the Windows image file boot (WIMBoot) configuration entries for a specified disk volume.

Name: Get-WindowsCapability
Synopsis: Gets Windows capabilities for an image or a running operating system.

Name: Get-WindowsDriver
Synopsis: Displays information about drivers in a Windows image.

Name: Get-WindowsEdition
Synopsis: Gets edition information about a Windows image.

Name: Get-WindowsImage
Synopsis: Gets information about a Windows image in a WIM or VHD file.

Name: Get-WindowsImageContent
Synopsis: Displays a list of the files and folders in a specified image.

Name: Get-WindowsOptionalFeature
Synopsis: Gets information about optional features in a Windows image.

Name: Get-WindowsPackage
Synopsis: Gets information about packages in a Windows image.

Name: Get-WindowsReservedStorageState
Synopsis: Get-WindowsReservedStorageState [-LogPath <string>] [-ScratchDirectory <string>] [-LogLevel <LogLevel>] [<CommonParameters>]

Name: Mount-WindowsImage
Synopsis: Mounts a Windows image in a WIM or VHD file to a directory on the local computer.

Name: New-WindowsCustomImage
Synopsis: Captures an image of customized or serviced Windows components on a Windows Image File Boot (WIMBoot) configured device.

Name: New-WindowsImage
Synopsis: Captures an image of a drive to a new WIM file.

Name: Optimize-AppxProvisionedPackages
Synopsis:
Optimize-AppXProvisionedPackages -Path <string> [-WindowsDirectory <string>] [-SystemDrive <string>] [-LogPath <string>] [-ScratchDirectory <string>] [-LogLevel <LogLevel>] [<CommonParameters>]

Optimize-AppXProvisionedPackages -Online [-WindowsDirectory <string>] [-SystemDrive <string>] [-LogPath <string>] [-ScratchDirectory <string>] [-LogLevel <LogLevel>] [<CommonParameters>]

Name: Optimize-WindowsImage
Synopsis: Configures a Windows image with specified optimizations.

Name: Remove-AppxProvisionedPackage
Synopsis: Removes an app package (.appx) from a Windows image.

Name: Remove-WindowsCapability
Synopsis: Uninstalls a Windows capability package from an image.

Name: Remove-WindowsDriver
Synopsis: Removes a driver from an offline Windows image.

Name: Remove-WindowsImage
Synopsis: Deletes the specified volume image from a WIM file that has multiple volume images.

Name: Remove-WindowsPackage
Synopsis: Removes a package from a Windows image.

Name: Repair-WindowsImage
Synopsis: Repairs a Windows image in a WIM or VHD file.

Name: Save-WindowsImage
Synopsis: Applies changes made to a mounted image to its WIM or VHD file.

Name: Set-AppXProvisionedDataFile
Synopsis: Adds custom data into the specified app (.appx) package that has been provisioned in a Windows image.

Name: Set-NonRemovableAppsPolicy
Synopsis:
Set-NonRemovableAppsPolicy -PackageFamilyName <string> -NonRemovable <int> -Path <string> [-WindowsDirectory <string>] [-SystemDrive <string>] [-LogPath <string>] [-ScratchDirectory <string>] [-LogLevel <LogLevel>] [<CommonParameters>]

Set-NonRemovableAppsPolicy -PackageFamilyName <string> -NonRemovable <int> -Online [-WindowsDirectory <string>] [-SystemDrive <string>] [-LogPath <string>] [-ScratchDirectory <string>] [-LogLevel <LogLevel>] [<CommonParameters>]

Name: Set-WindowsEdition
Synopsis: Changes a Windows image to a higher edition.

Name: Set-WindowsProductKey
Synopsis: Sets the product key for the Windows image.

Name: Set-WindowsReservedStorageState
Synopsis: Set-WindowsReservedStorageState -State <ReservedStorageState> [-LogPath <string>] [-ScratchDirectory <string>] [-LogLevel <LogLevel>] [<CommonParameters>]

Name: Split-WindowsImage
Synopsis: Splits an existing .wim file into multiple read-only split .wim files.

Name: Start-OSUninstall
Synopsis:
Start-OSUninstall -Path <string> [-NoRestart] [-WindowsDirectory <string>] [-SystemDrive <string>] [-LogPath <string>] [-ScratchDirectory <string>] [-LogLevel <LogLevel>] [<CommonParameters>]

Start-OSUninstall -Online [-NoRestart] [-WindowsDirectory <string>] [-SystemDrive <string>] [-LogPath <string>] [-ScratchDirectory <string>] [-LogLevel <LogLevel>] [<CommonParameters>]

Name: Update-WIMBootEntry
Synopsis: Updates the Windows image file boot (WIMBoot) configuration entry, associated with either the specified data source ID, the renamed image file path or the moved image file path.

Name: Use-WindowsUnattend
Synopsis: Applies an unattended answer file to a Windows image.
